text: Anatoly Nikolayevich Alyabyev (; 12 December 1951 â€“ 11 January 2022) was a Soviet biathlete. He was born in Velsky District, RSFSR, Soviet Union. Alyabyev won two gold medals and a bronze medal at the 1980 Summer Olympics. Alyabyev died from COVID-19 in Saint Petersburg, Russia on 11 January 2022, at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Russia
title: Anatoly Alyabyev
